editor.label: Application server - IIS createwebsite2
editor.description: This procedure uses the ADSI API to create a web site on an IIS server.

formElement.label: Binding string:
formElement.documentation: Provide the binding string that includes IP and port. Use this format: "IP:Port:". Take of the ":" at the end.

formElement.label: Generate random ID:
formElement.documentation: If checked, this generates a random web site ID. Otherwise, it attempts to create the web site with the user-supplied ID.

formElement.label: Host name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the host name of the IIS server. If the procedure is run on the host itself, use 'localhost'.

formElement.label: Absolute physical path of the web site:
formElement.documentation: Provide the absolute physical path assigned to the web site you want to create.

formElement.label: Server comment:
formElement.documentation: Provide the server comment for the new web site. In the IIS Manager, this is the Description field under Web Site Identification in a web site property sheet.

formElement.label: Server ID:
formElement.documentation: Provide the site identification number to attach to the site that you want to create. If no ID is specified, the site is created with a random ID.
